long_description: Carry the Gerber Exchange-A-Blade(TM) saw on camping trips so you can cut firewood down to size. Includes a coarse blade and a fine blade for cutting different types of wood; blades are easy to swap out. Blade locks solidly into place when rotated out for use. Handle is made of fiberglass-filled ABS plastic, offering lightweight strength; sides of the handle are textured for a comfortable grip in wet or dry conditions. Gerber Exchange-A-Blade(TM) saw includes a sheath.
short_description: Carry the Gerber Exchange-A-Blade(TM) saw on camping trips so you can cut firewood down to size.
